text: This List of members of the American Academy of Arts and Letters Department of Art shows the members of one of the three departments of the American Academy of Arts and Letters. After being nominated by current members, new members are selected in two elections, the first by the department they join (Art, Literature or Music). Candidates who receive the most votes in their own department are then voted on by the entire membership. ==Current members== ==A== * Robert Adams – 2014 ==B== * Jennifer Bartlett – 2003 * Lynda Benglis – 2012 * Lee Bontecou – 2004 ==C== * Vija Celmins, 1996 * Chuck Close, 1992 ==D== * Mark Di Suvero, 1986 * Elizabeth Diller, 2012 * Jim Dine, 1980 * Lois Dodd, 1998 * Rackstraw Downes, 1999 ==E== *Nicole Eisenman, 2018 *Peter Eisenman, 2001 ==F== * Eric Fischl, 2006 * Kenneth Frampton, 2012 * Mary Frank, 1984 ==G== * Frank O.
